articles.description: Americans usually retire at 65 with a net worth of $266, 400 — but Amazon founder Jeff Bezos's situation is far from ordinary.
articles.content:
Jeff Bezos' reign as Amazon CEO will come to an end on Monday, and he'll be stepping down as the world's richest person.

articles.description: Americans are hitting the road as strong economic growth pushes up oil prices, and Republicans are trying to pin pump prices on Biden's energy policies.

articles.title: Argentina 3-0 Ecuador: Lionel Messi scores one and sets up two as Argentina reach Copa America semi-finals - Sky Sports
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored a free-kick and served up two assists as Argentina beat Ecuador 3-0 on Saturday to set themselves up for a Copa America semi-final against Colombia.
